name: rewiser
title: Rewiser
description: Track and manage your Rewiser transactions directly from Raycast
author: rewiser_io

commands.name: add-transaction
commands.title: Add Transaction (RewiserAI)
commands.description: Add a transaction by simply saying "I spent $20 at a restaurant"

commands.name: transaction-list
commands.title: Monthly Transactions
commands.description: Select a folder to view and manage transactions from the current month

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
